Uses of Class
org.springframework.util.ConstantException

Packages that use ConstantException
org.springframework.util Miscellaneous utility classes, such as String manipulation utilities, a Log4J configurer, and a state holder for paged lists of objects. 
 

Uses of ConstantException in org.springframework.util
 

Methods in org.springframework.util that throw ConstantException
 java.lang.Number Constants.asNumber(java.lang.String code)
          Return a constant value cast to a Number.
 java.lang.String Constants.asString(java.lang.String code)
          Return a constant value as a String.
 java.lang.Object Constants.asObject(java.lang.String code)
          Parse the given string (upper or lower case accepted) and return the appropriate value if it's the name of a constant field in the class we're analysing.
 java.lang.String Constants.toCode(java.lang.Object value, java.lang.String namePrefix)
          Look up the given value within the given group of constants.
